Testimonial Text: The DZ put a lot of effort into students and their safety.
Name: N. Barr

Testimonial Text: They really focus on your progression, and are very organized. I highly recommend this DZ to any student skydiver.
Name: bilwel

Testimonial Text: As a student, the staff is very helpful and willing to work with you.
Name: Juniormints

Testimonial Text: A lot of DZ's make you beg for personal attention. Not here.
Name: bilwel

Testimonial Text: I can't say enough great things about this drop zone.  Some of the best skydivers that you'll ever meet are here.
Name: D. Zhang

Testimonial Text: An excellent place to learn to skydive!  I earned my A license, and the instructors were very precise and careful.
Name: N. Barr
